website_summaries.verdict: A more natural option without parabens or other additives, making it gentle for all hair types, even treated hair.
pros: Cruelty free dry shampoo refreshes hair leaving it smelling good
Product sprays onto hair without leaving powdery residue
cons: Requires user to blend in the product and is not good for very oily hair

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo EVER but I won't buy this brand again
customer_reviews.text: So this is the best dry shampoo I've ever used, but I discovered that Eva NYC is literally the exact same. Amika says they are salon exclusive so I guess rebranding allows them to sell their products outside salons. Well, the Eva products are cheaper and there is no difference except the name & design of the label. So while this is my favorite dry shampoo, and I would highly recommend it, I will not repurchase the Amika version. Both Amika & Eva are cruelty free which is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, will never buy any other dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo ever. It smells great, absorbs the oil, and you can use it multiple days. For me, I can use it for about two days until my scalp gets too itchy (day 1 is shower, day 2 no dry shampoo, then two more days of dry shampoo before I absolutely have to wash). Don't judge - you all are here because you're also lazy with your hair washing routine lol
customer_reviews.author: C&M

customer_reviews.title: I typically LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.text: Although I first bought this from Sephora, I loved the product. From Amazon, however, I think it's an old product, as it does not smell the same (it still smells close to the Amika product), and it has a less favorable consistency when applied. As for the original Amika Perk Up dry shampoo, I frigging love this dry shampoo. I bought this a second time over the Oribe dry texturizing spray. They're both great products, but the scent of Amika is way more intoxicating and the price point is phenomenal. If you found this review helpful, please click the button below to let me know to keep reviewing other purchases I have made! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine, limp
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, limp, thin hair, and this is the ONLY dry shampoo that does anything at all to my hair. I get oily the day following a shampoo, and usually cannot use dry shampoo because it's much too oily to go a 2nd day. I've tried so many other name-brands and they are horrible and weigh my hair down. It is a little pricey for the size, but it's well worth it. It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Madly Madly in love with this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Yasssss!! Heee hee... I have long whimpy fine hair. I so wish it was fun, thick, behaved hair but it is not. It gets greasy at the sight of a light mousse. This stuff has changed my life, literally. I spray it on every morning and my hair does not look like I brushed it with a pork chop, like it normally would by 3pm. It smells amazing and I am pretty sure I am going to use it for the rest of my life. I am madly in love with this product, plus it smells heavenly. I normally do not spend $20+ bucks on hair stuff but this stuff is worth EVERY penny. :)
customer_reviews.author: SheJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't Be Fooled
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the pricing & packaging. I am a loyal DryBar customer but I wanted a cheaper dry shampoo to keep in my travel bag so I tried this one out. The amount of effort that is put in to shaking the bottle to make sure the powder comes out is a little ridiculous to me. I thought I shook it enough & started to spray but it was just liquid. Shook it a lot more & the powder finally came out. To make an actually difference you're shaking & spraying for so long you might as well just wash your hair. Great price, pretty bottle, terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Idiot Proof
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a sample of this through my BirchBox subscription, and I was skeptical because I'd had bad luck in the past with dry shampoo. But this stuff is idiot-proof. No weird white residue, adds volume, and smells AMAZING. I find myself looking forward to the days I sleep through my alarm and need to skip washing my hair ;)
customer_reviews.author: Penguin77

customer_reviews.title: Life wouldnt be the same without
customer_reviews.text: Im an advocate for not over washing hair (half for scalp/hair health and half out of sheer laziness) and Amika is my all time favorite. I usually spray some at night to help the product settle into my hair and just massage any left over in the AM. This is the best dry shampoo i've used. Ive tried living proof and several other dry shampoos and although this price point is a bit higher its worth it to not have smelly/ greasy hair all the time. I have fine hair and this is really a life saver from helping me not look like a llama licked my head in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Anna_Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Love this dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I work out daily and I have long thick hair that takes awhile to dry and style. I don't want to wash daily, but my hair on day 2 looks a little flat and unclean. With this dry shampoo, I spray it all over the roots after my workout and shower, and redry my hair. My day 2 hair now looks as good or better than a full shampoo, in less than 1/2 the time. It does on dry. You do need to use a dryer and style your hair or it could leave a weird residue, but that is not the case for me. I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice any difference in 2nd day hair- came out wet and did nothing
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed and the only thing that came out was some clear liquid that did nothing to soak up oil. Tried it several times and each time was left very disappointed and with an oily head at the end of my 2nd day after washing. No added volume like other dry shampoos either.
customer_reviews.author: Tkolive

customer_reviews.title: LOOK NO FURTHER!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is seriously amazing and I'm so happy I've finally found it! I've tried what feels like hundreds of different brands (OGX, Batiste, Dove, Not Your Mother's, Hask, Wella, Psssst, AG, Bumble and Bumble) LITERALLY EVERYTHING! I have color treated, thin, oily hair and unfortunately, sometimes it smells. I have to wash it every day because of oil production but this dry shampoo has helped my color last longer and hair feel healthier. Take it from me! I work at Walgreens and have used every retail level dry shampoo available as well as most salon products (best friend is a hair dresser). This stuff is life changing!
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: great product, strong smell
customer_reviews.text: effective dry shampoo. the powder mist is fine so it blends more easily into dark hair, and hopefully absorbs better too. worth noting that while the smell is nice - i have gotten a few compliments - it is incredibly, impossibly strong for the first few minutes. i honestly think it’s a nice smell but it’s so strong that i turn on a fan and go to a different room after i put it in my hair and brush it out. highly recommend the product despite this but would maybe discourage it if your living situation isn’t well-ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, the best dry shampoo I've ever used. I've tried many brands and they all either leave a white residue or leave my hair feeling dirtier. This brand smells great, doesn't leave a residue and leaves my hair feeling and looking clean in between shampoos. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticking with my old dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: After reading some good reviews from bloggers, I decided to try this product because my hair has been extra oily and I thought this might be better than what I have been using. I was disappointed. There are some issues with the product not spraying consistently, but the main problem is that it looked like cheap white color like you would buy at the dollar store for Halloween. I was able to brush it out and the color went away. The product smells pretty good and did help reduce the oil in my hair, but I am going to stick with It's a 10 Dry Shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Amika Dry Shampoo - the Best
customer_reviews.text: I like the Amika Perk Up Dry Sampoo as it does not leave a powdery residue on your hair. Your hair is left without a white powder residue and a clean finish. Make sure to spray the roots around the front of your face, neck area and other root areas of your hair, then leave on for a few minutes before brushing or using your hands to brush through your hair. Also, I use Amika, The Wizard Multi-Benefit for hair product.
customer_reviews.author: BeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dry shampoo so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry shampoo! Yes, it is authentic from Amazon. I have fine hair that gets greasy and weighed down easily... but I also use heat on it everyday. So, many dry shampoos dry my hair out BAD and the heat just makes it break off. This stuff smells amazing and really takes away my oil without leaving a powdery residue. This is my second time purchasing and I will be purchasing again! I also love their dry conditioner.. it takes my fly aways down in 2.5 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Shuell

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing dry shampoo ever! I've tried so many different kinds looking for the best one, and this is it. The smell is heavenly, but not overpowering. It doesn't take much, and leaves no residue on my hair. Once you use this product, your hair is clean for days. It cleans your hair without drying and damaging it! I loved this so much, that I now have purchased many products from the line and love them all. I can't recommend this dry shampoo enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry shampoo. First of all, it doesn't smell awful...every other dry shampoo I've used smells horribly. It's also great for day 3 or 4 of not washing my hair- I put it on and I'm able to go about my day without worrying that my hair looks gross. The only thing I'll add is that I have blonde hair...this dry shampoo blends in well with my hair, but may not with a darker color as it goes on pretty light.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E.

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail dry shampoo; beats the competition by a mile!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best dry shampoo I have ever tried. It leaves the least residue while making my hair look much less greasy. The smell is mild and pleasant; some kind of floral smell. It works even better than some other more expensive brands such as Oribe, and it beats the cult classic Batiste dry shampoo as well. I'm so glad I can buy this through Amazon because it's hard to find in stores. This is my holy grail dry shampoo. Tip: listen to the directions when it says to shake well before spraying, that makes a big difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite. The only thing that would make it better ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. The only thing that would make it better would be the price. Wish it was cheaper. Leaves little white residue, gives tons of body to hair and it smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Dena R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, but even applying a lot, seems to barely make any difference in the oiliness of hair (and I had only been on second day since full wash). I felt like I used so much the can must be half-empty after one use. Especially given how little hr and nearly empty the can is when arriving to begin with. Used once since purchase, and I expect it will be used quite sparingly before the can runs out.
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaLK

customer_reviews.title: Spray mechanism no longer works after one use
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this dry shampoo because I've heard so many good things! Unfortunately I only used it once before the spray mechanism on the top of the bottle will no longer work! It's a full bottle and I can't even use it...the smell was wonderful the one time I did use it. For the price I would have expected a better quality bottle. (Sigh 😔)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Mom of 2 gives it 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as part of my Birch Box subscription. I am not one to try a lot of products on my hair, however I am a mom of two and I desperately needed something to help with second day hair... This gives your hair a clean look with a boost of volume. I have thin, easily greasy hair. So this helped a ton! I used all of my trial size can, then I used all of my mom's that she got from her Birch Box... so then I had to order off of here! And I was pretty happy with the price as well. I LOVE this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NTHRUSH

customer_reviews.title: Smells good too!

It smells good and works great on those days when you just don't have time to wash your hair. I don't use it often, but it's great to know it's there when I need it. And I love the smell of it.
customer_reviews.author: The Novel LadyTop Contributor: Pets

We try to avoid anything with aluminum so I was so happy to find this as it uses rice starch instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gilks

customer_reviews.title: Its a favorite of Mine

customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: The best dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Best dry shampoo I have ever used. My hair looks freshly washed for about 4 days when I use this product every day. Not powdery, but soaks up grease. Does not dull hair color.
customer_reviews.author: pearly

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use another dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other dry shampoo brands. Started with tresseme (?) and hated the smell and the residue it left behind. Then switched to Sebastian's dry clean dry shampoo and liked it better than the first but also hated the smell of it. A coworker told me about this product and I am in love! Smells absolutely amazing and doesn't leave that white residue in my hair (I am a brunette) some times after curling or straightening my hair I'll spray a little in my hair for added texture and for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Works Okay, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo does not work as well as others I have tried. It leaves my hair feeling sticky instead of refreshed. Mileage may vary based on your hair type - I have highlighted blonde hair that is naturally pretty oily. It is a good price, but I'd rather pay a bit more for a more quality product. I recommend Living Proof or Drybar dry shampoos instead.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Weaver

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL OF DRY SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my stylist who maintains my platinum, and I am so impressed! I’ve used Ouai, Aveeno (discontinued), fekai, and various drugstore brands and can confidently say Amika is the best. The price point is fair for a high end dry shampoo. I am sensitive to fragrances, and I find this one to be pleasantly vanilla-y. It is similar to that “just left the salon” smell, which I love. It’s not overpowering like many dry shampoos I’ve tried. Very impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rsline

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several dry shampoos, and this one is by far the best! It does turn my hair white, and it really does help give my hair some lift, without making it feel brittle. And it smells wonderful. It's just really expensive - nearly three times more than my second favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing.
customer_reviews.text: I personally do not like this product at all. It doesn’t absorb oil or make hair look cleaner. I would not buy this again. It really doesn’t do anything at all to my hair and it smells a little like hairspray which doesn’t smell clean. Lush makes a powder day shampoo and it’s much much better than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! I got this dry shampoo as a ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT! I got this dry shampoo as a sample in my BirchBox and loved it ever since! I looked on BirchBox's website to buy a full size bottle of it, but of course it was $21 for one bottle!! So I looked at what Amazon had offer, and I was able to find a seller who sold me TWO full size bottles for $17!!! It's a great product because it doesn't make your hair white or oily like I've found other products do. And it smells AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: One of best dry shamps I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Holy grail of dry shampoo. I am blonde, so many dark-haired users may have a different experience - it definitely comes out "white-ish." If I blow out my hair at night, spray some of this in before bed, I wake up like I just washed my hair. Scent is great, especially compared to some cheaper brands. I also like Not Your Mother's Clean Freak Dry Shampoo, but this smells better, feels lighter, and works just as well. Good for travel, but over the carry-on threshold.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Use on clean hair for best results.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. It works best if you start using it the first day after washing your hair. I’m able to go about 8-10 days without need to wash my hair and without it looking greasy. It does create a build up though if you use it for that long. I spray it every morning and it makes my hair look like I just blew it dry. I reorder it about once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Works on my black hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have black hair, and you cannot see this dry shampoo at all. The initial spray does come out white, but then I run my fingers through my hair a few times, and it's all blended in. It smells nice and adds volume. I have curly hair that I painstakingly straighten, and since I discovered this I can add another day or two in between blowouts.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but the bottle I got seems to have less dry shampoo in it than usual? Not sure if it was a "light" batch, but it doesn't seem as effective as previous bottles I have gotten (same brand).
customer_reviews.author: Priya B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Prettiest can of dry shampoo I’ve ever owned. Originally got a sample size in my birch box years ago and remembered it all this time later (so the packaging worked!). Definitely dries up oil and adds bounce with a great scent. Leaves no residue. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Johna

customer_reviews.title: strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I dont recommend this for longer hair or if you are sensitive to strong perfume. I used it twice and just couldn't handle the smell, and had to wash my hair afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Melissa Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap purpose to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I love that this was a good bang for your buck purchase! Does the job and I make sure I have it in the car in my purse to use any time I feel like I'm getting greasy. The only issue is sometimes after a while it doesn't seem to last very long
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue on dark hair
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo leaves a residue on dark brown hair. Smell was okay. I bought because other reviewers said it did not leave a residue on dark hair. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Smells pretty good, but can't see I understand the hype ...

Smells pretty good, but can't see I understand the hype or why this is the best selling product. Didn't seem any better than the usual kind I get at Sally's Beauty Supplies, but I guess it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Star*Thrower

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I’ve ever used! I have oily, thick hair, and I have tried many different dry shampoos over the years. The Perk Up dry shampoo is the ONLY dry shampoo that has ever absorbed the excess oil from my hair. I spray it mainly around my temples and my bangs, and it makes my bangs look fuller and more bouncy. I really like the smell, and a little goes a long way. You just spray where you have oil buildup and your golden. It doesn’t make your hair feel weighed down and gross like other dry shampoos. I highly recommend his product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: The best dry shampoo on the market!

customer_reviews.author: Gregory Gire

customer_reviews.title: Great scent but doesn't keep hair quite as fresh as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but I'll probably try other brands to see which one I like the best. It definitely does NOT leave a white residue like some dry shampoos do, so that is the most important thing! The scent is really great too. But it doesn't keep my hair from getting an "oily look" like some other brands, so that's why it only gets 3 stars. If you don't have oily hair, this would probably be a good pick for you.
customer_reviews.author: Catazon :)

For best results, I spray it on clean, just washed hair. It gives my roots a little lift and keeps my style fresh for 2 days... sometimes 3 days. Seriously, it works so much better if you use before your hair is real oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

I may try a cheaper brand next, this seems a little high to use all the time.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Smells great and doesn't leave a weird residue when used to save my hair style or to compensate for oversleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Brookie:)

customer_reviews.title: The best dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo is amazing! I've tried many different kinds ranging from very inexpensive drugstore ones to higher end salon ones and this one is the first that actually absorbs oil, doesn't show against my dark roots and smells amazing to boot. I usually use it on third day hair and it really does make difference by adding body and soaking up excess oils from scalp. It is a little pricey, but well worth it in my opinion and comparable in price to any other salon quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dujan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Listen these Caucasians have been right all along about this dry shampoo! It fluffs my hair up between washes- I can only wash my hair once a week and this keeps it from getting greasy and weighed down. This doesn’t give you the dirty hair smell either. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obvious smell
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is too prominent and my hair still looks greasy. I have fine, dark hair and it is difficult to get the white powder appearance to go away too. I’m going back to Living Proof.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dry shampoo. Smells great. Works well. Comes out white but pretty easy to brush out and not have a residue. May have some residue with very dark hAir. I also use it to add volume
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Fragrance, Residue, Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Chose product based on reviews. Yes ,very strong fragrance that lasted for hours. Personally, I found it offensive. After multiple attempts, it continues to leave a fine, powdery residue on my dark hair. Packaging was adequate and it shipped as stated. Unreturnable given product type and special handling. Expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: So great
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo makes you feel extra clean. I got it in a birk box or whatever where you try favorited products every month. I thought the box was silly until I tried a few of the products. Turned around and bought most of the products, this being one of them!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Quality?
customer_reviews.text: Great dry shampoo product that I’ve loved when I’ve purchased it in stores over the years. However it seems that either the shipping process or something specific to this vendor has resulted in a quality meltdown after my first two uses. The spray head, covered with a plastic cap, filled with water overnight that leeched out of the bottle. All that was left inside of the bottle was a very thick white film substance. Literally never had this happen with this brand after years of use! Hopefully this is just a random rare occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: afu

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product at a beauty store and found it cheaper on Amazon. It arrived yeaterday and I absolutely love it. I have been using the Oscar Blanti volumizing dry shampoo which is wonderful but pricy. This product compares very well. No white streaks. Plus it has a pleasant scent which Oscar Blanti dry shampoo didn't have. I am very satisfied and am saving money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshes your hair, NO white flakes
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when you don't have time to wash and style your hair. Gotta go? Bend over, spray on, wait a few minutes, brush out. I like this one because it doesn't leave little white flakes like some brands do.
customer_reviews.author: db on Kindle

customer_reviews.title: This is the best and best smelling dry shampoo I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and best smelling dry shampoo I've ever had. I will not go with any other dry shampoo's now. I have dark hair and this absorbs nicely and I can go 3 days without washing my hair when I want to now. Wow!!
customer_reviews.author: L.Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is truly amazing and does not leave my hair stiff at all like the Kena brand did. I don't like how expensive it is since I could go through several bottles a month.

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I've ever used - smells good, and really effective in minimizing oil and keeping hair looking good between washings.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo- hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Best dry shampoo hands down. Only need one application, it smells so good, and it doesn’t leave a nasty color OR film on your scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product! I have used a very different dry shampoos that left my hairy feeling cakey and nasty. For my fine blonde hair! These works the best! I have also recommended it to a few friends as well who have fallen in love with it. I just wish it was a little cheaper, but I still buy it!
customer_reviews.author: LA2OCJESS

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The smell is wonderful, and it does a great job getting rid of unwanted hair oil. Will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: lovelylily

customer_reviews.title: ... different dry shampoos and this one is now my favorite. It doesn't leave the sticky feeling that many ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different dry shampoos and this one is now my favorite. It doesn't leave the sticky feeling that many do and has the great Amika fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: D. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It works great without making my hair look lack luster and when I use it it doesn't leave my hair feeling like a birds nest.
customer_reviews.author: bdbarney

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Not only does it work great, but it doesn't leave a white residue and literally freshens your hair of any smells. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: 🎧AudibleAddicted🎧Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I received this product in my birtchbox and fell in love and it was a must have so I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used many dry shampoo product. I received this product in my birtchbox and fell in love and it was a must have so I bought it. Most dry shampoo products will build up or leave hair oily by the end of the day. This product leaves your hair refreshed all day and the next day too. I have really oily hair too
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently trying three different dry shampoos- a powdered organic one, a suave one, and the green can from not your mother's best (something like that)- and Amika is hands down the best one I've had. Yes, it's a little pricey compared to dry shampoo's but I never had the sticky residue feeling I do with my current dry shampoos. Also, it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Now my hair looks just as good the day after I wash it, maybe not the second day but still good enough to pass muster.
customer_reviews.author: 5th and Spring

customer_reviews.title: Effective and smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best dry shampoo I've used. There is no residue or weird feeling in the hair after use. The scent is lovely and you don't have to use a lot of product to benefit. I try not to wash my hair more than 3x a week and I find that using this product helps to eliminate any oily spots at the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best dry shampoo product that I have used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best dry shampoo product that I have used. The bottle seems to last quite a while and doesn't smell nearly as bad as most other dry shampoo products out there. Be sure to shake well before using. Also, it can make hair look powdery similar to using baby powder if you apply too close. Price on amazon is cheaper than I've found elsewhere including BirchBox (and I tend to check around prior to purchasing).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No white residue, great smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Doesn't leave your hair feeling sticky or that it has residue on it. I have darker hair and constantly had a problem with dry shampoos leaving white behind. This product does not do that, and it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Priya Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for when we go out of town. Quick and easy. Smells good and not too many fumes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo has saved my life! Well, maybe not that far but is has extended the length that I can go between washing my hair. This is the only dry shampoo I’ll use. It doesn’t make my dark hair look white or like I have awful dandruff, and my hair stays soft after use. I can not recommend this stuff enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Milham

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance was too much for me, but I am super sensitive. The function was fine, but not as much texture as I wanted. This was really highly recommended by a friend that uses it, so it’s a very personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: BeauHank

customer_reviews.title: For the price I expected better. It does an okay job
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected better. It does an okay job. I have fine thin shiny hair which turns oily quickly. It took a lot of product before soaking up the oil. It is a lot of money to spend on something I am only going to get a few uses out of.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It is kinda pricey but so worth it! Your hair feels fresh and light, not overly powdery.
customer_reviews.author: MDeleon

customer_reviews.title: Not for all hair types..
customer_reviews.text: Great dry shampoo, definitely helps absorb the oils and makes your hair feel fresh and light. Smells great as well. Had to give it three stars as I have black hair and after using, it looked like my hair aged by 30 years! it was so chalky grey and it took me a while to get the color to hide. I may as well have washed my hair instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Banana

customer_reviews.title: You have to learn to go easy on the sprays
customer_reviews.text: My first try with this dry shampoo was not real successful. You have to learn to go easy on the sprays. The product tends to come out real quickly....so be careful not to over do it. But it does refresh hair and keeps me from wet shampooing it daily. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I've been searching for a dry shampoo that doesn't leave too much residue in my hair. This fits the bill perfectly! Worth the money, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Dry shampoo is an essential item for me, so I've tried a ton. Smells great, and doesn't leave a chalky white residue when brushed out. I have really fine hair and it doesn't weight it down, which I run into with a lot of other dry shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It smells delicious and really works on my dirty hair. Apply gently far from hair and scrub it.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Amika perk up
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing Lee great smelling product. I'm sure it cleans your hair, but it doesn't even have to be dirty to use this product, once you spray a couple of squirts you fluff your hair and it's just like you had just washed and blow dried it can't say enough good about this product. Try it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but don’t see much difference from the $10 bottle. It works good.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyMcDonald

product_meta.description:
Dry shampoo that doesn't leave your hair looking powdery or white. For all hair types. Safe for color treated hair.

BRAND STORY
amika is hair rebellion against conformity & the mundane. Founded by industry OUTSIDERS in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in 2007 amika is the antithesis of a typical beauty brand.
